hangman - package hangman
 
HangMan - Class in hangman
Class that holds the main method of the program.
HangMan() - Constructor for class hangman.HangMan
 
howManyLetters() - Static method in class hangman.ProcessData
Asks the user how many letters the word he's thinking of contains, returns that number.
howManyWords(String) - Static method in class hangman.ProcessData
Method to know how many possible words there are, does this until there's only 1 word, or there's multiple word's and it guessed all the letters (so the words are anagrams).
